! Example of SQE input file for BiCuSeO

&basic
ntypes = 4 
natoms = 8
nsize = 3 3 2
/

&inputsqe
elements = "Bi" "Cu" "Se" "O"
nat = 2 2 2 2
temp = 300.d0
lneutron = .TRUE.
lxray = .FALSE.
qmesh = 20 20 20
write_rmsd = .TRUE.
! read_rmsd = .TRUE.
path = 0 1 0
ne = 500
dE = 0.05
nqlong = 300
nqperpen = 5
dL = 0.01
dP = 0.006
q0 = 3.d0 3.d0 0.d0
nonanalytic = .FALSE.
lresfunc = .TRUE.
functype = "CNCS12"
xm = 2
/

LATTICE_PARAMETERS
1.0
     3.9535210380492276   -0.0000000000000000   -0.0000000000000000
    -0.0000000000000000    3.9535210380492276   -0.0000000000000000
    -0.0000000000000000   -0.0000000000000000    9.0753729051409913

ATOMIC_POSITIONS
direct
  0.2500000000000000  0.2500000000000000  0.1396757182675747
  0.7500000000000000  0.7500000000000000  0.8603242527324266
  0.7500000000000000  0.2500000000000000  0.5000000000000000
  0.2500000000000000  0.7500000000000000  0.5000000000000000
  0.2500000000000000  0.2500000000000000  0.6730958609573343
  0.7500000000000000  0.7500000000000000  0.3269041390426587
  0.7500000000000000  0.2500000000000000  0.0000000000000000
  0.2500000000000000  0.7500000000000000  0.0000000000000000
